00064 typedef struct Ocean {
00065     /* ********* input parameters to the sim ********* */
00066     float _V;
00067     float _l;
00068     float _w;
00069     float _A;
00070     float _damp_reflections;
00071     float _wind_alignment;
00072     float _depth;
00073 
00074     float _wx;
00075     float _wz;
00076 
00077     float _L;
00078 
00079     /* dimensions of computational grid */
00080     int _M;
00081     int _N;
00082 
00083     /* spatial size of computational grid */
00084     float _Lx;
00085     float _Lz;
00086 
00087     float normalize_factor;                 // init w
00088     float time;
00089 
00090     short _do_disp_y;
00091     short _do_normals;
00092     short _do_chop;
00093     short _do_jacobian;
00094 
00095     /* mutex for threaded texture access */
00096     ThreadRWMutex oceanmutex;
00097 
00098     /* ********* sim data arrays ********* */
00099 
00100     /* two dimensional arrays of complex */
00101     fftw_complex *_fft_in;          // init w   sim w
00102     fftw_complex *_fft_in_x;            // init w   sim w
00103     fftw_complex *_fft_in_z;            // init w   sim w
00104     fftw_complex *_fft_in_jxx;          // init w   sim w
00105     fftw_complex *_fft_in_jzz;          // init w   sim w
00106     fftw_complex *_fft_in_jxz;          // init w   sim w
00107     fftw_complex *_fft_in_nx;           // init w   sim w
00108     fftw_complex *_fft_in_nz;           // init w   sim w
00109     fftw_complex *_htilda;          // init w   sim w (only once)
00110 
00111     /* fftw "plans" */
00112     fftw_plan _disp_y_plan;         // init w   sim r
00113     fftw_plan _disp_x_plan;         // init w   sim r
00114     fftw_plan _disp_z_plan;         // init w   sim r
00115     fftw_plan _N_x_plan;            // init w   sim r
00116     fftw_plan _N_z_plan;            // init w   sim r
00117     fftw_plan _Jxx_plan;            // init w   sim r
00118     fftw_plan _Jxz_plan;            // init w   sim r
00119     fftw_plan _Jzz_plan;            // init w   sim r
00120 
00121     /* two dimensional arrays of float */
00122     double *  _disp_y;              // init w   sim w via plan?
00123     double * _N_x;                  // init w   sim w via plan?
00124     /*float * _N_y; all member of this array has same values, so convert this array to a float to reduce memory usage (MEM01)*/
00125     double _N_y;                    //          sim w ********* can be rearranged?
00126     double * _N_z;                  // init w   sim w via plan?
00127     double * _disp_x;               // init w   sim w via plan?
00128     double * _disp_z;               // init w   sim w via plan?
00129 
00130     /* two dimensional arrays of float */
00131     /* Jacobian and minimum eigenvalue */
00132     double * _Jxx;                  // init w   sim w
00133     double * _Jzz;                  // init w   sim w
00134     double * _Jxz;                  // init w   sim w
00135 
00136     /* one dimensional float array */
00137     float * _kx;                    // init w   sim r
00138     float * _kz;                    // init w   sim r
00139 
00140     /* two dimensional complex array */
00141     fftw_complex * _h0;             // init w   sim r
00142     fftw_complex * _h0_minus;       // init w   sim r
00143 
00144     /* two dimensional float array */
00145     float * _k;                     // init w   sim r
00146 } Ocean;

00150 static float nextfr(float min, float max)
00151 {
00152     return BLI_frand()*(min-max)+max;
00153 }
00154 
00155 static float gaussRand (void)
00156 {
00157     float x;        // Note: to avoid numerical problems with very small
00158     float y;        // numbers, we make these variables singe-precision
00159     float length2;  // floats, but later we call the double-precision log()
00160     // and sqrt() functions instead of logf() and sqrtf().
00161     do
00162     {
00163         x = (float) (nextfr (-1, 1));
00164         y = (float)(nextfr (-1, 1));
00165         length2 = x * x + y * y;
00166     }
00167     while (length2 >= 1 || length2 == 0);
00168 
00169     return x * sqrtf(-2.0f * logf(length2) / length2);
00170 }
00171 
00175 MINLINE float lerp(float a,float b,float f)
00176 {
00177     return a + (b-a)*f;
00178 }
00179 
00180 MINLINE float catrom(float p0,float p1,float p2,float p3,float f)
00181 {
00182     return 0.5f *((2.0f * p1) +
00183                   (-p0 + p2) * f +
00184                   (2.0f*p0 - 5.0f*p1 + 4.0f*p2 - p3) * f*f +
00185                   (-p0 + 3.0f*p1- 3.0f*p2 + p3) * f*f*f);
00186 }
00187 
00188 MINLINE float omega(float k, float depth)
00189 {
00190     return sqrt(GRAVITY*k * tanh(k*depth));
00191 }
00192 
00193 // modified Phillips spectrum
00194 static float Ph(struct Ocean* o, float kx,float kz )
00195 {
00196     float tmp;
00197     float k2 = kx*kx + kz*kz;
00198 
00199     if (k2 == 0.0f)
00200     {
00201         return 0.0f; // no DC component
00202     }
00203 
00204     // damp out the waves going in the direction opposite the wind
00205     tmp = (o->_wx * kx  + o->_wz * kz)/sqrtf(k2);
00206     if (tmp < 0)
00207     {
00208         tmp *= o->_damp_reflections;
00209     }
00210 
00211     return o->_A * expf( -1.0f / (k2*(o->_L*o->_L))) * expf(-k2 * (o->_l*o->_l)) * powf(fabsf(tmp),o->_wind_alignment) / (k2*k2);
00212 }
00213 
00214 static void compute_eigenstuff(struct OceanResult *ocr, float jxx,float jzz,float jxz)
00215 {
00216     float a,b,qplus,qminus;
00217     a = jxx + jzz;
00218     b = sqrt((jxx - jzz)*(jxx - jzz) + 4 * jxz * jxz);
00219 
00220     ocr->Jminus = 0.5f*(a-b);
00221     ocr->Jplus  = 0.5f*(a+b);
00222 
00223     qplus  = (ocr->Jplus  - jxx)/jxz;
00224     qminus = (ocr->Jminus - jxx)/jxz;
00225 
00226     a = sqrt(1 + qplus*qplus);
00227     b = sqrt(1 + qminus*qminus);
00228 
00229     ocr->Eplus[0] = 1.0f/ a;
00230     ocr->Eplus[1] = 0.0f;
00231     ocr->Eplus[2] = qplus/a;
00232 
00233     ocr->Eminus[0] = 1.0f/b;
00234     ocr->Eminus[1] = 0.0f;
00235     ocr->Eminus[2] = qminus/b;
00236 }

00239  * instead of Complex.h
00240  * in fftw.h "fftw_complex" typedefed as double[2]
00241  * below you can see functions are needed to work with such complex numbers.
00242  * */
00243 static void init_complex(fftw_complex cmpl, float real, float image)
00244 {
00245     cmpl[0] = real;
00246     cmpl[1] = image;
00247 }

00250 static void add_complex_f(fftw_complex res, fftw_complex cmpl, float f)
00251 {
00252     res[0] = cmpl[0] + f;
00253     res[1] = cmpl[1];

00257 static void add_comlex_c(fftw_complex res, fftw_complex cmpl1, fftw_complex cmpl2)
00258 {
00259     res[0] = cmpl1[0] + cmpl2[0];
00260     res[1] = cmpl1[1] + cmpl2[1];
00261 }
00262 
00263 static void mul_complex_f(fftw_complex res, fftw_complex cmpl, float f)
00264 {
00265     res[0] = cmpl[0]*f;
00266     res[1] = cmpl[1]*f;
00267 }
00268 
00269 static void mul_complex_c(fftw_complex res, fftw_complex cmpl1, fftw_complex cmpl2)
00270 {
00271     fftwf_complex temp;
00272     temp[0] = cmpl1[0]*cmpl2[0]-cmpl1[1]*cmpl2[1];
00273     temp[1] = cmpl1[0]*cmpl2[1]+cmpl1[1]*cmpl2[0];
00274     res[0] = temp[0];
00275     res[1] = temp[1];
00276 }
00277 
00278 static float real_c(fftw_complex cmpl)
00279 {
00280     return cmpl[0];
00281 }
00282 
00283 static float image_c(fftw_complex cmpl)
00284 {
00285     return cmpl[1];
00286 }
00287 
00288 static void conj_complex(fftw_complex res, fftw_complex cmpl1)
00289 {
00290     res[0] = cmpl1[0];
00291     res[1] = -cmpl1[1];
00292 }
00293 
00294 static void exp_complex(fftw_complex res, fftw_complex cmpl)
00295 {
00296     float r = expf(cmpl[0]);
00297 
00298     res[0] = cos(cmpl[1])*r;
00299     res[1] = sin(cmpl[1])*r;
00300 }

00302 float BKE_ocean_jminus_to_foam(float jminus, float coverage)
00303 {
00304     float foam = jminus * -0.005f + coverage;
00305     CLAMP(foam, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00306     return foam*foam;
00307 }
00308 
00309 void BKE_ocean_eval_uv(struct Ocean *oc, struct OceanResult *ocr, float u,float v)
00310 {
00311     int i0,i1,j0,j1;
00312     float frac_x,frac_z;
00313     float uu,vv;
00314 
00315     // first wrap the texture so 0 <= (u,v) < 1
00316     u = fmodf(u,1.0f);
00317     v = fmodf(v,1.0f);
00318 
00319     if (u < 0) u += 1.0f;
00320     if (v < 0) v += 1.0f;
00321 
00322     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&oc->oceanmutex, THREAD_LOCK_READ);
00323 
00324     uu = u * oc->_M;
00325     vv = v * oc->_N;
00326 
00327     i0 = (int)floor(uu);
00328     j0 = (int)floor(vv);
00329 
00330     i1 = (i0 + 1);
00331     j1 = (j0 + 1);
00332 
00333     frac_x = uu - i0;
00334     frac_z = vv - j0;
00335 
00336     i0 = i0 % oc->_M;
00337     j0 = j0 % oc->_N;
00338 
00339     i1 = i1 % oc->_M;
00340     j1 = j1 % oc->_N;
00341 
00342 
00343 #define BILERP(m) (lerp(lerp(m[i0*oc->_N+j0],m[i1*oc->_N+j0],frac_x),lerp(m[i0*oc->_N+j1],m[i1*oc->_N+j1],frac_x),frac_z))
00344     {
00345         if (oc->_do_disp_y) {
00346             ocr->disp[1] = BILERP(oc->_disp_y);
00347         }
00348 
00349         if (oc->_do_normals) {
00350             ocr->normal[0] = BILERP(oc->_N_x);
00351             ocr->normal[1] = oc->_N_y/*BILERP(oc->_N_y) (MEM01)*/;
00352             ocr->normal[2] = BILERP(oc->_N_z);
00353         }
00354 
00355         if (oc->_do_chop) {
00356             ocr->disp[0] = BILERP(oc->_disp_x);
00357             ocr->disp[2] = BILERP(oc->_disp_z);
00358         }
00359         else {
00360             ocr->disp[0] = 0.0;
00361             ocr->disp[2] = 0.0;
00362         }
00363 
00364         if (oc->_do_jacobian) {
00365             compute_eigenstuff(ocr, BILERP(oc->_Jxx),BILERP(oc->_Jzz),BILERP(oc->_Jxz));
00366         }
00367     }
00368 #undef BILERP
00369 
00370     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&oc->oceanmutex);
00371 }
00372 
00373 // use catmullrom interpolation rather than linear
00374 void BKE_ocean_eval_uv_catrom(struct Ocean *oc, struct OceanResult *ocr, float u,float v)
00375 {
00376     int i0,i1,i2,i3,j0,j1,j2,j3;
00377     float frac_x,frac_z;
00378     float uu,vv;
00379 
00380     // first wrap the texture so 0 <= (u,v) < 1
00381     u = fmod(u,1.0f);
00382     v = fmod(v,1.0f);
00383 
00384     if (u < 0) u += 1.0f;
00385     if (v < 0) v += 1.0f;
00386 
00387     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&oc->oceanmutex, THREAD_LOCK_READ);
00388 
00389     uu = u * oc->_M;
00390     vv = v * oc->_N;
00391 
00392     i1 = (int)floor(uu);
00393     j1 = (int)floor(vv);
00394 
00395     i2 = (i1 + 1);
00396     j2 = (j1 + 1);
00397 
00398     frac_x = uu - i1;
00399     frac_z = vv - j1;
00400 
00401     i1 = i1 % oc->_M;
00402     j1 = j1 % oc->_N;
00403 
00404     i2 = i2 % oc->_M;
00405     j2 = j2 % oc->_N;
00406 
00407     i0 = (i1-1);
00408     i3 = (i2+1);
00409     i0 = i0 <   0 ? i0 + oc->_M : i0;
00410     i3 = i3 >= oc->_M ? i3 - oc->_M : i3;
00411 
00412     j0 = (j1-1);
00413     j3 = (j2+1);
00414     j0 = j0 <   0 ? j0 + oc->_N : j0;
00415     j3 = j3 >= oc->_N ? j3 - oc->_N : j3;
00416 
00417 #define INTERP(m) catrom(catrom(m[i0*oc->_N+j0],m[i1*oc->_N+j0],m[i2*oc->_N+j0],m[i3*oc->_N+j0],frac_x),\
00418     catrom(m[i0*oc->_N+j1],m[i1*oc->_N+j1],m[i2*oc->_N+j1],m[i3*oc->_N+j1],frac_x),\
00419     catrom(m[i0*oc->_N+j2],m[i1*oc->_N+j2],m[i2*oc->_N+j2],m[i3*oc->_N+j2],frac_x),\
00420     catrom(m[i0*oc->_N+j3],m[i1*oc->_N+j3],m[i2*oc->_N+j3],m[i3*oc->_N+j3],frac_x),\
00421     frac_z)
00422 
00423     {
00424         if (oc->_do_disp_y)
00425         {
00426             ocr->disp[1] = INTERP(oc->_disp_y);
00427         }
00428         if (oc->_do_normals)
00429         {
00430             ocr->normal[0] = INTERP(oc->_N_x);
00431             ocr->normal[1] = oc->_N_y/*INTERP(oc->_N_y) (MEM01)*/;
00432             ocr->normal[2] = INTERP(oc->_N_z);
00433         }
00434         if (oc->_do_chop)
00435         {
00436             ocr->disp[0] = INTERP(oc->_disp_x);
00437             ocr->disp[2] = INTERP(oc->_disp_z);
00438         }
00439         else {
00440             ocr->disp[0] = 0.0;
00441             ocr->disp[2] = 0.0;
00442         }
00443 
00444         if (oc->_do_jacobian)
00445         {
00446             compute_eigenstuff(ocr, INTERP(oc->_Jxx),INTERP(oc->_Jzz),INTERP(oc->_Jxz));
00447         }
00448     }
00449 #undef INTERP
00450 
00451     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&oc->oceanmutex);
00452 
00453 }

00455 void BKE_ocean_eval_xz(struct Ocean *oc, struct OceanResult *ocr, float x,float z)
00456 {
00457     BKE_ocean_eval_uv(oc, ocr, x/oc->_Lx,z/oc->_Lz);
00458 }
00459 
00460 void BKE_ocean_eval_xz_catrom(struct Ocean *oc, struct OceanResult *ocr, float x,float z)
00461 {
00462     BKE_ocean_eval_uv_catrom(oc, ocr, x/oc->_Lx,z/oc->_Lz);
00463 }

00465 // note that this doesn't wrap properly for i,j < 0, but its
00466 // not really meant for that being just a way to get the raw data out
00467 // to save in some image format.
00468 void BKE_ocean_eval_ij(struct Ocean *oc, struct OceanResult *ocr, int i,int j)
00469 {
00470     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&oc->oceanmutex, THREAD_LOCK_READ);
00471 
00472     i = abs(i) % oc->_M;
00473     j = abs(j) % oc->_N;
00474 
00475     ocr->disp[1] = oc->_do_disp_y ? oc->_disp_y[i*oc->_N+j] : 0.0f;
00476 
00477     if (oc->_do_chop)
00478     {
00479         ocr->disp[0] = oc->_disp_x[i*oc->_N+j];
00480         ocr->disp[2] = oc->_disp_z[i*oc->_N+j];
00481     }
00482     else {
00483         ocr->disp[0] = 0.0f;
00484         ocr->disp[2] = 0.0f;
00485     }
00486 
00487     if (oc->_do_normals)
00488     {
00489         ocr->normal[0] = oc->_N_x[i*oc->_N+j];
00490         ocr->normal[1] = oc->_N_y/*oc->_N_y[i*oc->_N+j] (MEM01)*/;
00491         ocr->normal[2] = oc->_N_z[i*oc->_N+j];
00492 
00493         normalize_v3(ocr->normal);
00494     }
00495 
00496     if (oc->_do_jacobian)
00497     {
00498         compute_eigenstuff(ocr, oc->_Jxx[i*oc->_N+j],oc->_Jzz[i*oc->_N+j],oc->_Jxz[i*oc->_N+j]);
00499     }
00500 
00501     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&oc->oceanmutex);
00502 }
00503 
00504 void BKE_simulate_ocean(struct Ocean *o, float t, float scale, float chop_amount)
00505 {
00506     int i, j;
00507 
00508     scale *= o->normalize_factor;
00509 
00510     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&o->oceanmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
00511 
00512     // compute a new htilda
00513 #pragma omp parallel for private(i, j)
00514     for (i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i)
00515     {
00516         // note the <= _N/2 here, see the fftw doco about
00517         // the mechanics of the complex->real fft storage
00518         for ( j  = 0 ; j  <= o->_N / 2 ; ++j)
00519         {
00520             fftw_complex exp_param1;
00521             fftw_complex exp_param2;
00522             fftw_complex conj_param;
00523 
00524 
00525             init_complex(exp_param1, 0.0, omega(o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j],o->_depth)*t);
00526             init_complex(exp_param2, 0.0, -omega(o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j],o->_depth)*t);
00527             exp_complex(exp_param1, exp_param1);
00528             exp_complex(exp_param2, exp_param2);
00529             conj_complex(conj_param, o->_h0_minus[i*o->_N+j]);
00530 
00531             mul_complex_c(exp_param1, o->_h0[i*o->_N+j], exp_param1);
00532             mul_complex_c(exp_param2, conj_param, exp_param2);
00533 
00534             add_comlex_c(o->_htilda[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j], exp_param1, exp_param2);
00535             mul_complex_f(o->_fft_in[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j], o->_htilda[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j], scale);
00536         }
00537     }
00538 
00539 #pragma omp parallel sections private(i, j)
00540     {
00541 
00542 #pragma omp section
00543         {
00544             if (o->_do_disp_y)
00545             {
00546                 // y displacement
00547                 fftw_execute(o->_disp_y_plan);
00548             }
00549         } // section 1
00550 
00551 #pragma omp section
00552         {
00553             if (o->_do_chop)
00554             {
00555                 // x displacement
00556                 for ( i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i)
00557                 {
00558                     for ( j  = 0 ; j  <= o->_N / 2 ; ++j)
00559                     {
00560                         fftw_complex mul_param;
00561                         fftw_complex minus_i;
00562 
00563                         init_complex(minus_i, 0.0, -1.0);
00564                         init_complex(mul_param, -scale, 0);
00565                         mul_complex_f(mul_param, mul_param, chop_amount);
00566                         mul_complex_c(mul_param, mul_param, minus_i);
00567                         mul_complex_c(mul_param, mul_param, o->_htilda[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j]);
00568                         mul_complex_f(mul_param, mul_param, (o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j] == 0.0 ? 0.0 : o->_kx[i] / o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j]));
00569                         init_complex(o->_fft_in_x[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j], real_c(mul_param), image_c(mul_param));
00570                     }
00571                 }
00572                 fftw_execute(o->_disp_x_plan);
00573             }
00574         } //section 2
00575 
00576 #pragma omp section
00577         {
00578             if (o->_do_chop)
00579             {
00580                 // z displacement
00581                 for ( i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i)
00582                 {
00583                     for ( j  = 0 ; j  <= o->_N / 2 ; ++j)
00584                     {
00585                         fftw_complex mul_param;
00586                         fftw_complex minus_i;
00587 
00588                         init_complex(minus_i, 0.0, -1.0);
00589                         init_complex(mul_param, -scale, 0);
00590                         mul_complex_f(mul_param, mul_param, chop_amount);
00591                         mul_complex_c(mul_param, mul_param, minus_i);
00592                         mul_complex_c(mul_param, mul_param, o->_htilda[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j]);
00593                         mul_complex_f(mul_param, mul_param, (o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j] == 0.0 ? 0.0 : o->_kz[j] / o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j]));
00594                         init_complex(o->_fft_in_z[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j], real_c(mul_param), image_c(mul_param));
00595                     }
00596                 }
00597                 fftw_execute(o->_disp_z_plan);
00598             }
00599         } // section 3
00600 
00601 #pragma omp section
00602         {
00603             if (o->_do_jacobian)
00604             {
00605                 // Jxx
00606                 for ( i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i)
00607                 {
00608                     for ( j  = 0 ; j  <= o->_N / 2 ; ++j)
00609                     {
00610                         fftw_complex mul_param;
00611 
00612                         //init_complex(mul_param, -scale, 0);
00613                         init_complex(mul_param, -1, 0);
00614 
00615                         mul_complex_f(mul_param, mul_param, chop_amount);
00616                         mul_complex_c(mul_param, mul_param, o->_htilda[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j]);
00617                         mul_complex_f(mul_param, mul_param, (o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j] == 0.0 ? 0.0 : o->_kx[i]*o->_kx[i] / o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j]));
00618                         init_complex(o->_fft_in_jxx[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j], real_c(mul_param), image_c(mul_param));
00619                     }
00620                 }
00621                 fftw_execute(o->_Jxx_plan);
00622 
00623                 for ( i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i)
00624                 {
00625                     for ( j  = 0 ; j  < o->_N ; ++j)
00626                     {
00627                         o->_Jxx[i*o->_N+j] += 1.0;
00628                     }
00629                 }
00630             }
00631         } // section 4
00632 
00633 #pragma omp section
00634         {
00635             if (o->_do_jacobian)
00636             {
00637                 // Jzz
00638                 for ( i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i)
00639                 {
00640                     for ( j  = 0 ; j  <= o->_N / 2 ; ++j)
00641                     {
00642                         fftw_complex mul_param;
00643 
00644                         //init_complex(mul_param, -scale, 0);
00645                         init_complex(mul_param, -1, 0);
00646 
00647                         mul_complex_f(mul_param, mul_param, chop_amount);
00648                         mul_complex_c(mul_param, mul_param, o->_htilda[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j]);
00649                         mul_complex_f(mul_param, mul_param, (o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j] == 0.0 ? 0.0 : o->_kz[j]*o->_kz[j] / o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j]));
00650                         init_complex(o->_fft_in_jzz[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j], real_c(mul_param), image_c(mul_param));
00651                     }
00652                 }
00653                 fftw_execute(o->_Jzz_plan);
00654                 for ( i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i)
00655                 {
00656                     for ( j  = 0 ; j  < o->_N ; ++j)
00657                     {
00658                         o->_Jzz[i*o->_N+j] += 1.0;
00659                     }
00660                 }
00661             }
00662         } // section 5
00663 
00664 #pragma omp section
00665         {
00666             if (o->_do_jacobian)
00667             {
00668                 // Jxz
00669                 for ( i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i)
00670                 {
00671                     for ( j  = 0 ; j  <= o->_N / 2 ; ++j)
00672                     {
00673                         fftw_complex mul_param;
00674 
00675                         //init_complex(mul_param, -scale, 0);
00676                         init_complex(mul_param, -1, 0);
00677 
00678                         mul_complex_f(mul_param, mul_param, chop_amount);
00679                         mul_complex_c(mul_param, mul_param, o->_htilda[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j]);
00680                         mul_complex_f(mul_param, mul_param, (o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j] == 0.0f ? 0.0f : o->_kx[i]*o->_kz[j] / o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j]));
00681                         init_complex(o->_fft_in_jxz[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j], real_c(mul_param), image_c(mul_param));
00682                     }
00683                 }
00684                 fftw_execute(o->_Jxz_plan);
00685             }
00686         } // section 6
00687 
00688 #pragma omp section
00689         {
00690             // fft normals
00691             if (o->_do_normals)
00692             {
00693                 for ( i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i)
00694                 {
00695                     for ( j  = 0 ; j  <= o->_N / 2 ; ++j)
00696                     {
00697                         fftw_complex mul_param;
00698 
00699                         init_complex(mul_param, 0.0, -1.0);
00700                         mul_complex_c(mul_param, mul_param, o->_htilda[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j]);
00701                         mul_complex_f(mul_param, mul_param, o->_kx[i]);
00702                         init_complex(o->_fft_in_nx[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j], real_c(mul_param), image_c(mul_param));
00703                     }
00704                 }
00705                 fftw_execute(o->_N_x_plan);
00706 
00707             }
00708         } // section 7
00709 
00710 #pragma omp section
00711         {
00712             if (o->_do_normals)
00713             {
00714                 for ( i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i)
00715                 {
00716                     for ( j  = 0 ; j  <= o->_N / 2 ; ++j)
00717                     {
00718                         fftw_complex mul_param;
00719 
00720                         init_complex(mul_param, 0.0, -1.0);
00721                         mul_complex_c(mul_param, mul_param, o->_htilda[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j]);
00722                         mul_complex_f(mul_param, mul_param, o->_kz[i]);
00723                         init_complex(o->_fft_in_nz[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j], real_c(mul_param), image_c(mul_param));
00724                     }
00725                 }
00726                 fftw_execute(o->_N_z_plan);
00727 
00728 #if 0
00729                 for ( i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i) {
00730                     for ( j  = 0 ; j  < o->_N ; ++j) {
00731                         o->_N_y[i*o->_N+j] = 1.0f/scale;
00732                     }
00733                 }
00734                 (MEM01)
00735 #endif
00736             o->_N_y = 1.0f/scale;
00737             }
00738         } // section 8
00739 
00740     } // omp sections
00741 
00742     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&o->oceanmutex);
00743 }
00744 
00745 static void set_height_normalize_factor(struct Ocean *oc)
00746 {
00747     float res = 1.0;
00748     float max_h = 0.0;
00749 
00750     int i,j;
00751 
00752     if (!oc->_do_disp_y) return;
00753 
00754     oc->normalize_factor = 1.0;
00755 
00756     BKE_simulate_ocean(oc, 0.0, 1.0, 0);
00757 
00758     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&oc->oceanmutex, THREAD_LOCK_READ);
00759 
00760     for (i = 0; i < oc->_M; ++i)
00761     {
00762         for (j = 0; j < oc->_N; ++j)
00763         {
00764             if ( max_h < fabsf(oc->_disp_y[i*oc->_N+j]))
00765             {
00766                 max_h = fabsf(oc->_disp_y[i*oc->_N+j]);
00767             }
00768         }
00769     }
00770 
00771     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&oc->oceanmutex);
00772 
00773     if (max_h == 0.0f) max_h = 0.00001f; // just in case ...
00774 
00775     res = 1.0f / (max_h);
00776 
00777     oc->normalize_factor = res;
00778 }
00779 
00780 struct Ocean *BKE_add_ocean(void)
00781 {
00782     Ocean *oc = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Ocean), "ocean sim data");
00783 
00784     BLI_rw_mutex_init(&oc->oceanmutex);
00785 
00786     return oc;
00787 }
00788 
00789 void BKE_init_ocean(struct Ocean* o, int M,int N, float Lx, float Lz, float V, float l, float A, float w, float damp,
00790                     float alignment, float depth, float time, short do_height_field, short do_chop, short do_normals, short do_jacobian, int seed)
00791 {
00792     int i,j,ii;
00793 
00794     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&o->oceanmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
00795 
00796     o->_M = M;
00797     o->_N = N;
00798     o->_V = V;
00799     o->_l = l;
00800     o->_A = A;
00801     o->_w = w;
00802     o->_damp_reflections = 1.0f - damp;
00803     o->_wind_alignment = alignment;
00804     o->_depth = depth;
00805     o->_Lx = Lx;
00806     o->_Lz = Lz;
00807     o->_wx = cos(w);
00808     o->_wz = -sin(w); // wave direction
00809     o->_L = V*V / GRAVITY;  // largest wave for a given velocity V
00810     o->time = time;
00811 
00812     o->_do_disp_y = do_height_field;
00813     o->_do_normals = do_normals;
00814     o->_do_chop = do_chop;
00815     o->_do_jacobian = do_jacobian;
00816 
00817     o->_k = (float*) MEM_mallocN(M * (1+N/2) * sizeof(float), "ocean_k");
00818     o->_h0 = (fftw_complex*) MEM_mallocN(M * N * sizeof(fftw_complex), "ocean_h0");
00819     o->_h0_minus = (fftw_complex*) MEM_mallocN(M * N * sizeof(fftw_complex), "ocean_h0_minus");
00820     o->_kx = (float*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * sizeof(float), "ocean_kx");
00821     o->_kz = (float*) MEM_mallocN(o->_N * sizeof(float), "ocean_kz");
00822 
00823     // make this robust in the face of erroneous usage
00824     if (o->_Lx == 0.0f)
00825         o->_Lx = 0.001f;
00826 
00827     if (o->_Lz == 0.0f)
00828         o->_Lz = 0.001f;
00829 
00830     // the +ve components and DC
00831     for (i = 0 ; i <= o->_M/2 ; ++i)
00832         o->_kx[i] = 2.0f * (float)M_PI * i / o->_Lx;
00833 
00834     // the -ve components
00835     for (i = o->_M-1,ii=0 ; i > o->_M/2 ; --i,++ii)
00836         o->_kx[i] = -2.0f * (float)M_PI * ii / o->_Lx;
00837 
00838     // the +ve components and DC
00839     for (i = 0 ; i <= o->_N/2 ; ++i)
00840         o->_kz[i] = 2.0f * (float)M_PI * i / o->_Lz;
00841 
00842     // the -ve components
00843     for (i = o->_N-1,ii=0 ; i > o->_N/2 ; --i,++ii)
00844         o->_kz[i] = -2.0f * (float)M_PI * ii / o->_Lz;
00845 
00846     // pre-calculate the k matrix
00847     for (i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i)
00848         for (j  = 0 ; j  <= o->_N / 2 ; ++j)
00849             o->_k[i*(1+o->_N/2)+j] = sqrt(o->_kx[i]*o->_kx[i] + o->_kz[j]*o->_kz[j] );
00850 
00851     /*srand(seed);*/
00852     BLI_srand(seed);
00853 
00854     for (i = 0 ; i  < o->_M ; ++i)
00855     {
00856         for (j = 0 ; j  < o->_N ; ++j)
00857         {
00858             float r1 = gaussRand();
00859             float r2 = gaussRand();
00860 
00861             fftw_complex r1r2;
00862             init_complex(r1r2, r1, r2);
00863             mul_complex_f(o->_h0[i*o->_N+j], r1r2, (float)(sqrt(Ph(o,  o->_kx[i], o->_kz[j]) / 2.0f)));
00864             mul_complex_f(o->_h0_minus[i*o->_N+j], r1r2, (float)(sqrt(Ph(o, -o->_kx[i],-o->_kz[j]) / 2.0f)));
00865         }
00866     }
00867 
00868     o->_fft_in = (fftw_complex*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * (1+o->_N/2) * sizeof(fftw_complex), "ocean_fft_in");
00869     o->_htilda = (fftw_complex*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * (1+o->_N/2) * sizeof(fftw_complex), "ocean_htilda");
00870 
00871     if (o->_do_disp_y) {
00872         o->_disp_y = (double*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * o->_N * sizeof(double), "ocean_disp_y");
00873         o->_disp_y_plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_2d(o->_M,o->_N, o->_fft_in, o->_disp_y, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00874     }
00875 
00876     if (o->_do_normals) {
00877         o->_fft_in_nx = (fftw_complex*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * (1+o->_N/2) * sizeof(fftw_complex), "ocean_fft_in_nx");
00878         o->_fft_in_nz = (fftw_complex*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * (1+o->_N/2) * sizeof(fftw_complex), "ocean_fft_in_nz");
00879 
00880         o->_N_x = (double*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * o->_N * sizeof(double), "ocean_N_x");
00881         /*o->_N_y = (float*) fftwf_malloc(o->_M * o->_N * sizeof(float)); (MEM01)*/
00882         o->_N_z = (double*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * o->_N * sizeof(double), "ocean_N_z");
00883 
00884         o->_N_x_plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_2d(o->_M,o->_N, o->_fft_in_nx, o->_N_x, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00885         o->_N_z_plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_2d(o->_M,o->_N, o->_fft_in_nz, o->_N_z, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00886     }
00887 
00888     if (o->_do_chop) {
00889         o->_fft_in_x = (fftw_complex*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * (1+o->_N/2) * sizeof(fftw_complex), "ocean_fft_in_x");
00890         o->_fft_in_z = (fftw_complex*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * (1+o->_N/2) * sizeof(fftw_complex), "ocean_fft_in_z");
00891 
00892         o->_disp_x = (double*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * o->_N * sizeof(double), "ocean_disp_x");
00893         o->_disp_z = (double*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * o->_N * sizeof(double), "ocean_disp_z");
00894 
00895         o->_disp_x_plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_2d(o->_M,o->_N, o->_fft_in_x, o->_disp_x, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00896         o->_disp_z_plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_2d(o->_M,o->_N, o->_fft_in_z, o->_disp_z, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00897     }
00898     if (o->_do_jacobian) {
00899         o->_fft_in_jxx = (fftw_complex*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * (1+o->_N/2) * sizeof(fftw_complex), "ocean_fft_in_jxx");
00900         o->_fft_in_jzz = (fftw_complex*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * (1+o->_N/2) * sizeof(fftw_complex), "ocean_fft_in_jzz");
00901         o->_fft_in_jxz = (fftw_complex*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * (1+o->_N/2) * sizeof(fftw_complex), "ocean_fft_in_jxz");
00902 
00903         o->_Jxx = (double*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * o->_N * sizeof(double), "ocean_Jxx");
00904         o->_Jzz = (double*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * o->_N * sizeof(double), "ocean_Jzz");
00905         o->_Jxz = (double*) MEM_mallocN(o->_M * o->_N * sizeof(double), "ocean_Jxz");
00906 
00907         o->_Jxx_plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_2d(o->_M,o->_N, o->_fft_in_jxx, o->_Jxx, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00908         o->_Jzz_plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_2d(o->_M,o->_N, o->_fft_in_jzz, o->_Jzz, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00909         o->_Jxz_plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_2d(o->_M,o->_N, o->_fft_in_jxz, o->_Jxz, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00910     }
00911 
00912     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&o->oceanmutex);
00913 
00914     set_height_normalize_factor(o);
00915 
00916 }
00917 
00918 void BKE_free_ocean_data(struct Ocean *oc)
00919 {
00920     if (!oc) return;
00921 
00922     BLI_rw_mutex_lock(&oc->oceanmutex, THREAD_LOCK_WRITE);
00923 
00924     if (oc->_do_disp_y)
00925     {
00926         fftw_destroy_plan(oc->_disp_y_plan);
00927         MEM_freeN(oc->_disp_y);
00928     }
00929 
00930     if (oc->_do_normals)
00931     {
00932         MEM_freeN(oc->_fft_in_nx);
00933         MEM_freeN(oc->_fft_in_nz);
00934         fftw_destroy_plan(oc->_N_x_plan);
00935         fftw_destroy_plan(oc->_N_z_plan);
00936         MEM_freeN(oc->_N_x);
00937         /*fftwf_free(oc->_N_y); (MEM01)*/
00938         MEM_freeN(oc->_N_z);
00939     }
00940 
00941     if (oc->_do_chop)
00942     {
00943         MEM_freeN(oc->_fft_in_x);
00944         MEM_freeN(oc->_fft_in_z);
00945         fftw_destroy_plan(oc->_disp_x_plan);
00946         fftw_destroy_plan(oc->_disp_z_plan);
00947         MEM_freeN(oc->_disp_x);
00948         MEM_freeN(oc->_disp_z);
00949     }
00950 
00951     if (oc->_do_jacobian)
00952     {
00953         MEM_freeN(oc->_fft_in_jxx);
00954         MEM_freeN(oc->_fft_in_jzz);
00955         MEM_freeN(oc->_fft_in_jxz);
00956         fftw_destroy_plan(oc->_Jxx_plan);
00957         fftw_destroy_plan(oc->_Jzz_plan);
00958         fftw_destroy_plan(oc->_Jxz_plan);
00959         MEM_freeN(oc->_Jxx);
00960         MEM_freeN(oc->_Jzz);
00961         MEM_freeN(oc->_Jxz);
00962     }
00963 
00964     if (oc->_fft_in)
00965         MEM_freeN(oc->_fft_in);
00966 
00967     /* check that ocean data has been initialized */
00968     if (oc->_htilda) {
00969         MEM_freeN(oc->_htilda);
00970         MEM_freeN(oc->_k);
00971         MEM_freeN(oc->_h0);
00972         MEM_freeN(oc->_h0_minus);
00973         MEM_freeN(oc->_kx);
00974         MEM_freeN(oc->_kz);
00975     }
00976 
00977     BLI_rw_mutex_unlock(&oc->oceanmutex);
00978 }
00979 
00980 void BKE_free_ocean(struct Ocean *oc)
00981 {
00982     if (!oc) return;
00983 
00984     BKE_free_ocean_data(oc);
00985     BLI_rw_mutex_end(&oc->oceanmutex);
00986 
00987     MEM_freeN(oc);
00988 }

00990 #undef GRAVITY
00991 
00992 
00993 /* ********* Baking/Caching ********* */
00994 
00995 
00996 #define CACHE_TYPE_DISPLACE 1
00997 #define CACHE_TYPE_FOAM     2
00998 #define CACHE_TYPE_NORMAL   3
00999 
01000 static void cache_filename(char *string, const char *path, const char *relbase, int frame, int type)
01001 {
01002     char cachepath[FILE_MAX];
01003     const char *fname;
01004 
01005     switch(type) {
01006     case CACHE_TYPE_FOAM:
01007         fname= "foam_";
01008         break;
01009     case CACHE_TYPE_NORMAL:
01010         fname= "normal_";
01011         break;
01012     case CACHE_TYPE_DISPLACE:
01013     default:
01014         fname= "disp_";
01015         break;
01016     }
01017 
01018     BLI_join_dirfile(cachepath, sizeof(cachepath), path, fname);
01019 
01020     BKE_makepicstring(string, cachepath, relbase, frame, R_IMF_IMTYPE_OPENEXR, 1, TRUE);
01021 }
01022 
01023 /* silly functions but useful to inline when the args do a lot of indirections */
01024 MINLINE void rgb_to_rgba_unit_alpha(float r_rgba[4], const float rgb[3])
01025 {
01026     r_rgba[0]= rgb[0];
01027     r_rgba[1]= rgb[1];
01028     r_rgba[2]= rgb[2];
01029     r_rgba[3]= 1.0f;
01030 }
01031 MINLINE void value_to_rgba_unit_alpha(float r_rgba[4], const float value)
01032 {
01033     r_rgba[0]= value;
01034     r_rgba[1]= value;
01035     r_rgba[2]= value;
01036     r_rgba[3]= 1.0f;
01037 }
01038 
01039 void BKE_free_ocean_cache(struct OceanCache *och)
01040 {
01041     int i, f=0;
01042 
01043     if (!och) return;
01044 
01045     if (och->ibufs_disp) {
01046         for (i=och->start, f=0; i<=och->end; i++, f++)
01047         {
01048             if (och->ibufs_disp[f]) {
01049                 IMB_freeImBuf(och->ibufs_disp[f]);
01050             }
01051         }
01052         MEM_freeN(och->ibufs_disp);
01053     }
01054 
01055     if (och->ibufs_foam) {
01056         for (i=och->start, f=0; i<=och->end; i++, f++)
01057         {
01058             if (och->ibufs_foam[f]) {
01059                 IMB_freeImBuf(och->ibufs_foam[f]);
01060             }
01061         }
01062         MEM_freeN(och->ibufs_foam);
01063     }
01064 
01065     if (och->ibufs_norm) {
01066         for (i=och->start, f=0; i<=och->end; i++, f++)
01067         {
01068             if (och->ibufs_norm[f]) {
01069                 IMB_freeImBuf(och->ibufs_norm[f]);
01070             }
01071         }
01072         MEM_freeN(och->ibufs_norm);
01073     }
01074 
01075     if (och->time)
01076         MEM_freeN(och->time);
01077     MEM_freeN(och);
01078 }
01079 
01080 void BKE_ocean_cache_eval_uv(struct OceanCache *och, struct OceanResult *ocr, int f, float u, float v)
01081 {
01082     int res_x = och->resolution_x;
01083     int res_y = och->resolution_y;
01084     float result[4];
01085 
01086     u = fmod(u, 1.0);
01087     v = fmod(v, 1.0);
01088 
01089     if (u < 0) u += 1.0f;
01090     if (v < 0) v += 1.0f;
01091 
01092     if (och->ibufs_disp[f]) {
01093         ibuf_sample(och->ibufs_disp[f], u, v, (1.0f/(float)res_x), (1.0f/(float)res_y), result);
01094         copy_v3_v3(ocr->disp, result);
01095     }
01096 
01097     if (och->ibufs_foam[f]) {
01098         ibuf_sample(och->ibufs_foam[f], u, v, (1.0f/(float)res_x), (1.0f/(float)res_y), result);
01099         ocr->foam = result[0];
01100     }
01101 
01102     if (och->ibufs_norm[f]) {
01103         ibuf_sample(och->ibufs_norm[f], u, v, (1.0f/(float)res_x), (1.0f/(float)res_y), result);
01104         copy_v3_v3(ocr->normal, result);
01105     }
01106 }
01107 
01108 void BKE_ocean_cache_eval_ij(struct OceanCache *och, struct OceanResult *ocr, int f, int i, int j)
01109 {
01110     const int res_x = och->resolution_x;
01111     const int res_y = och->resolution_y;
01112 
01113     if (i < 0) i= -i;
01114     if (j < 0) j= -j;
01115 
01116     i = i % res_x;
01117     j = j % res_y;
01118 
01119     if (och->ibufs_disp[f]) {
01120         copy_v3_v3(ocr->disp, &och->ibufs_disp[f]->rect_float[4*(res_x*j + i)]);
01121     }
01122 
01123     if (och->ibufs_foam[f]) {
01124         ocr->foam = och->ibufs_foam[f]->rect_float[4*(res_x*j + i)];
01125     }
01126 
01127     if (och->ibufs_norm[f]) {
01128         copy_v3_v3(ocr->normal, &och->ibufs_norm[f]->rect_float[4*(res_x*j + i)]);
01129     }
01130 }
01131 
01132 struct OceanCache *BKE_init_ocean_cache(const char *bakepath, const char *relbase,
01133                                         int start, int end, float wave_scale,
01134                                         float chop_amount, float foam_coverage, float foam_fade, int resolution)
01135 {
01136     OceanCache *och = MEM_callocN(sizeof(OceanCache), "ocean cache data");
01137 
01138     och->bakepath = bakepath;
01139     och->relbase = relbase;
01140 
01141     och->start = start;
01142     och->end = end;
01143     och->duration = (end - start) + 1;
01144     och->wave_scale = wave_scale;
01145     och->chop_amount = chop_amount;
01146     och->foam_coverage = foam_coverage;
01147     och->foam_fade = foam_fade;
01148     och->resolution_x = resolution*resolution;
01149     och->resolution_y = resolution*resolution;
01150 
01151     och->ibufs_disp = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ImBuf *)*och->duration, "displacement imbuf pointer array");
01152     och->ibufs_foam = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ImBuf *)*och->duration, "foam imbuf pointer array");
01153     och->ibufs_norm = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ImBuf *)*och->duration, "normal imbuf pointer array");
01154 
01155     och->time = NULL;
01156 
01157     return och;
01158 }
01159 
01160 void BKE_simulate_ocean_cache(struct OceanCache *och, int frame)
01161 {
01162     char string[FILE_MAX];
01163     int f = frame;
01164 
01165     /* ibufs array is zero based, but filenames are based on frame numbers */
01166     /* still need to clamp frame numbers to valid range of images on disk though */
01167     CLAMP(frame, och->start, och->end);
01168     f = frame - och->start; // shift to 0 based
01169 
01170     /* if image is already loaded in mem, return */
01171     if (och->ibufs_disp[f] != NULL ) return;
01172 
01173 
01174     cache_filename(string, och->bakepath, och->relbase, frame, CACHE_TYPE_DISPLACE);
01175     och->ibufs_disp[f] = IMB_loadiffname(string, 0);
01176     //if (och->ibufs_disp[f] == NULL) printf("error loading %s\n", string);
01177     //else printf("loaded cache %s\n", string);
01178 
01179     cache_filename(string, och->bakepath, och->relbase, frame, CACHE_TYPE_FOAM);
01180     och->ibufs_foam[f] = IMB_loadiffname(string, 0);
01181     //if (och->ibufs_foam[f] == NULL) printf("error loading %s\n", string);
01182     //else printf("loaded cache %s\n", string);
01183 
01184     cache_filename(string, och->bakepath, och->relbase, frame, CACHE_TYPE_NORMAL);
01185     och->ibufs_norm[f] = IMB_loadiffname(string, 0);
01186     //if (och->ibufs_norm[f] == NULL) printf("error loading %s\n", string);
01187     //else printf("loaded cache %s\n", string);
01188 }
01189 
01190 
01191 void BKE_bake_ocean(struct Ocean *o, struct OceanCache *och, void (*update_cb)(void *, float progress, int *cancel), void *update_cb_data)
01192 {
01193     /* note: some of these values remain uninitialized unless certain options
01194      * are enabled, take care that BKE_ocean_eval_ij() initializes a member
01195      * before use - campbell */
01196     OceanResult ocr;
01197 
01198     ImageFormatData imf= {0};
01199 
01200     int f, i=0, x, y, cancel=0;
01201     float progress;
01202 
01203     ImBuf *ibuf_foam, *ibuf_disp, *ibuf_normal;
01204     float *prev_foam;
01205     int res_x = och->resolution_x;
01206     int res_y = och->resolution_y;
01207     char string[FILE_MAX];
01208 
01209     if (!o) return;
01210 
01211     if (o->_do_jacobian) prev_foam = MEM_callocN(res_x*res_y*sizeof(float), "previous frame foam bake data");
01212     else                 prev_foam = NULL;
01213 
01214     BLI_srand(0);
01215 
01216     /* setup image format */
01217     imf.imtype= R_IMF_IMTYPE_OPENEXR;
01218     imf.depth=  R_IMF_CHAN_DEPTH_16;
01219     imf.exr_codec= R_IMF_EXR_CODEC_ZIP;
01220 
01221     for (f=och->start, i=0; f<=och->end; f++, i++) {
01222 
01223         /* create a new imbuf to store image for this frame */
01224         ibuf_foam = IMB_allocImBuf(res_x, res_y, 32, IB_rectfloat);
01225         ibuf_disp = IMB_allocImBuf(res_x, res_y, 32, IB_rectfloat);
01226         ibuf_normal = IMB_allocImBuf(res_x, res_y, 32, IB_rectfloat);
01227 
01228         ibuf_disp->profile = ibuf_foam->profile = ibuf_normal->profile = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
01229 
01230         BKE_simulate_ocean(o, och->time[i], och->wave_scale, och->chop_amount);
01231 
01232         /* add new foam */
01233         for (y=0; y < res_y; y++) {
01234             for (x=0; x < res_x; x++) {
01235 
01236                 BKE_ocean_eval_ij(o, &ocr, x, y);
01237 
01238                 /* add to the image */
01239                 rgb_to_rgba_unit_alpha(&ibuf_disp->rect_float[4*(res_x*y + x)], ocr.disp);
01240 
01241                 if (o->_do_jacobian) {
01242                     /* TODO, cleanup unused code - campbell */
01243 
01244                     float /*r,*/ /* UNUSED */ pr=0.0f, foam_result;
01245                     float neg_disp, neg_eplus;
01246 
01247                     ocr.foam = BKE_ocean_jminus_to_foam(ocr.Jminus, och->foam_coverage);
01248 
01249                     /* accumulate previous value for this cell */
01250                     if (i > 0) {
01251                         pr = prev_foam[res_x*y + x];
01252                     }
01253 
01254                     /* r = BLI_frand(); */ /* UNUSED */ // randomly reduce foam
01255 
01256                     //pr = pr * och->foam_fade;     // overall fade
01257 
01258                     // remember ocean coord sys is Y up!
01259                     // break up the foam where height (Y) is low (wave valley),
01260                     // and X and Z displacement is greatest
01261 
01262 #if 0
01263                     vec[0] = ocr.disp[0];
01264                     vec[1] = ocr.disp[2];
01265                     hor_stretch = len_v2(vec);
01266                     CLAMP(hor_stretch, 0.0, 1.0);
01267 #endif
01268 
01269                     neg_disp = ocr.disp[1] < 0.0f ? 1.0f+ocr.disp[1] : 1.0f;
01270                     neg_disp = neg_disp < 0.0f ? 0.0f : neg_disp;
01271 
01272                     /* foam, 'ocr.Eplus' only initialized with do_jacobian */
01273                     neg_eplus = ocr.Eplus[2] < 0.0f ? 1.0f + ocr.Eplus[2]:1.0f;
01274                     neg_eplus = neg_eplus<0.0f ? 0.0f : neg_eplus;
01275 
01276                     //if (ocr.disp[1] < 0.0 || r > och->foam_fade)
01277                     //  pr *= och->foam_fade;
01278 
01279 
01280                     //pr = pr * (1.0 - hor_stretch) * ocr.disp[1];
01281                     //pr = pr * neg_disp * neg_eplus;
01282 
01283                     if (pr < 1.0f) pr *=pr;
01284 
01285                     pr *= och->foam_fade * (0.75f + neg_eplus * 0.25f);
01286 
01287 
01288                     foam_result = pr + ocr.foam;
01289 
01290                     prev_foam[res_x*y + x] = foam_result;
01291 
01292                     value_to_rgba_unit_alpha(&ibuf_foam->rect_float[4*(res_x*y + x)], foam_result);
01293                 }
01294 
01295                 if (o->_do_normals) {
01296                     rgb_to_rgba_unit_alpha(&ibuf_normal->rect_float[4*(res_x*y + x)], ocr.normal);
01297                 }
01298             }
01299         }
01300 
01301         /* write the images */
01302         cache_filename(string, och->bakepath, och->relbase, f, CACHE_TYPE_DISPLACE);
01303         if (0 == BKE_write_ibuf(ibuf_disp, string, &imf))
01304             printf("Cannot save Displacement File Output to %s\n", string);
01305 
01306         if (o->_do_jacobian) {
01307             cache_filename(string, och->bakepath, och->relbase,  f, CACHE_TYPE_FOAM);
01308             if (0 == BKE_write_ibuf(ibuf_foam, string, &imf))
01309                 printf("Cannot save Foam File Output to %s\n", string);
01310         }
01311 
01312         if (o->_do_normals) {
01313             cache_filename(string, och->bakepath,  och->relbase, f, CACHE_TYPE_NORMAL);
01314             if (0 == BKE_write_ibuf(ibuf_normal, string, &imf))
01315                 printf("Cannot save Normal File Output to %s\n", string);
01316         }
01317 
01318         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf_disp);
01319         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf_foam);
01320         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf_normal);
01321 
01322         progress = (f - och->start) / (float)och->duration;
01323 
01324         update_cb(update_cb_data, progress, &cancel);
01325 
01326         if (cancel) {
01327             if (prev_foam) MEM_freeN(prev_foam);
01328             return;
01329         }
01330     }
01331 
01332     if (prev_foam) MEM_freeN(prev_foam);
01333     och->baked = 1;
01334 }
